com.app.utility.validation

Class CRUDValidationTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.utility.validation.CRUDValidationTool

  • public class CRUDValidationTool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores validation methods for validations done on SPECIFIC inputs of an incoming CRUD request. Unless special bypass is required, a CRUDValidator object should be instantiated to validate the incoming request. The CRUDValidator will call methods in this class to validate each request.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      ArrayList for storing error messages for JSON output.

    • Method Detail

      • isAmountValid

        public boolean isAmountValid(java.lang.String amountStr)
        Test the format of the amount input. Input must be greater than 10 and contain at most 2 decimal places.
        Parameters:
        amountStr - the bid amount as String value
        Returns:
        - true, if amount has no formatting errors
